$:/core/ui/TiddlerFieldTemplate.title: $:/core/ui/TiddlerFieldTemplate
$:/core/ui/TiddlerFieldTemplate.text: \define getFieldName() $:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \define toggle-field-visibility() \whitespace trim <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" disabled={{{ [is[shadow]then[yes]] }}}> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="hide" default="show" tag="span"> {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-visibility/images/eye-strikethrough}} <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="show" default="show" tag="span"> {{$:/core/images/preview-open}} <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $value="hide"/> \end <$text text=<>/> <$view field=<>/> <>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-visibility/rea.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/field-visibility/readme
$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-visibility/rea.text:
\define showInfo()
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/popup/tiddler-info-471453735" text="yes" />
\end

This plugin adds a toggle button to the Fields tab in the tiddler info area, which can be seen in tiddler view mode.

If you need the tiddler info button in edit mode you will need to install the: "Tiddler Info in Edit Mode" plugin.

<$button actions=<<showInfo>> to="test-field-visibility" >
Click this button to show the tiddler info area
</$button>

''Important:'' This plugin changes the following core tiddlers

* $:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo/Fields
* $:/core/ui/TiddlerFieldTemplate
